content.text:
# Discovery Elementary School

Discovery Elementary School may refer to:
Canada
}|Canada|
* Discovery Elementary School, a school in School District 36 Surrey, Surrey, White Rock, and Barnston Island, British Columbia
* Discovery Elementary School (Shawnigan Lake), a school in School District 79 Cowichan Valley, Vancouver Island, British Columbia}}
United States
}|US|
* Discovery Elementary School, a school in Ashburn, Virginia
* Discovery Elementary School, a school in Palm Bay, Florida
* Discovery Elementary School, a closed school in Fennville, Michigan
* Discovery Elementary School, a school in Kentwood, Michigan
* Discovery Early Childhood Center at Endeavour School, a school in North Hanover Township School District, Burlington County, New Jersey
* Discovery Elementary School, a school in Peninsula School District, Gig Harbor, Washington
* Discovery Elementary School, a school in Issaquah School District, King County, Washington
* Discovery Elementary School, a school in Mukilteo School District, Mukilteo, Washington}}
See also
* Discovery (disambiguation)
* Discovery Academy (disambiguation)
* Discovery School (disambiguation)
